snippet: The Tampa Bay Rays and David Price, the American League Cy Young Award winner, have agreed to a one-year deal for just over $10 million and avoided arbitration.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Tampa Bay Rays and pitcher David Price agree to a one-year contract worth a little more than $10 million; other baseball developments noted.
lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Rays and David Price, the American League Cy Young Award winner, have agreed to a one-year deal for just over $10 million and avoided arbitration.

headline.seo: David Price and Tampa Bay Rays Agree to One-Year Deal
headline.main: Rays Agree to One-Year Deal With Their Cy Young Winner
headline.print_headline: Rays and Cy Young Winner Agree to One-Year Deal
